pullRequest.title: SONARJAVA-3056 Avoid adding VM bootclasspath when possible
pullRequest.bodyText: SonarLint Eclipse and IntelliJ are passing the right android.jar/rt.jar/jrt-fs.jar as part of sonar.java.libraries, so in this case it is better to not prepend to VM bootclasspath to avoid FP/FN.

commit.message: SONARJAVA-3056 Do not prepend VM bootclasspath if already provided

nodes.bodyText: While nothing is shown here, eclipse tells me that there extra spaces. Could you drop them?
This causes a code smell, can you mark it as "won't fix" if you don't plan to fix it?
I feel this set should be a constant
I feel that these are 3 distinct tests. I would test them with a @nested test class
shouldn't we test something there anyway then?

commit.message: fixup! SONARJAVA-3056 Do not prepend VM bootclasspath if already provided
Try to fix test on Windows
